message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-value asset. My initial offer is $1200000 for the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I've taken it into consideration. However, I still believe the product's value is higher than $900000. My next offer is $1050000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I'm getting a fair price for this valuable asset.

I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $950000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the market value.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, Bob. However, I'm still not convinced that $950000 is a fair price for this product. My next offer is $1000000, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand your position, but I'm still not willing to go above $950000. I'm willing to make one more concession and meet you at $975000. This is the highest I'm willing to go.
